description.value:
This tangy gum cracks and pops in your mouth as you chew it. While you're chewing crackling bubble gum, for up to 10 minutes, you have a +2 item bonus to saving throws against auditory and sonic effects.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Crackling Bubble Gum]

Secondary Effect 2 (sonic)

Effect You blow a bubble with the gum until it pops, after which it becomes inert. The pop deals @Damage[6d4[sonic]] to all creatures in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] with a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25|basic:true] save. A creature that fails its save is also bound with sticky gum, taking a â€“10-foot item penalty to its Speed for 1 minute. The creature can remove the gum with a total of 3 Interact actions. These actions don't have to be consecutive, and other creatures can provide the actions as well.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Crackling Bubble Gum (Failure)]
